overview: What happens when 3 horny guys go to camp out at a friend's emu ranch? They set up their tent and decide to play a little game of strip "Spin the Bottle", of course! We watch as each lad loses his shirt and pants, and before you know it, a no-holes-barred 3-way begins. Claudio Mar and Rick Gallo get down and dirty with humpy new-cummer Johan Berg to start this incredible 90 minute sexual free for all. 6 nut-draining sex scenes, featuring 12 stunning 18 to 23 year old models are featured. This "F" Troop will get an "A+" when it comes to sexual adventure. Non-stop action with some of Central Europe's cutest guys! Another winner from Man's Best!
title: Der Stoßtrupp
